This website is in an early draft format and will be relocated when finished.  *Everything on the Tutorials, Tools, and other pages is (currently) either really dumb, wrong, or grammatically inaccurate.*  

As you begin your first project using methods of textual analysis, it is useful to think about several important factors: 

1. The research questions you want to address (or how to develop research questions)
2. The data you will be analyzing
3. The methods you will use to organize, analyze, and interpreting the data

To help you think through these questions
